# gxg-column

<h2>Notes:</h2>
<ol>
    <li>Use a column with <code>width="fluid"</code> if you want the content to span all the available width.</li>
    
</ol>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                                                                                                    | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `width`  | `width`   |             | `"1/2" \| "1/3" \| "1/4" \| "1/5" \| "2/3" \| "2/5" \| "3/4" \| "3/5" \| "4/5" \| "content" \| "fluid"` | `"fluid"` |
